basic_data.name: CLX 350
basic_data.additional_name: Processing material: Steel, Stainless Steel, Aluminum, Cast Iron, Non-ferrous Metals, Plastic
basic_data.description: CLX 350 is an advanced turn-mill machine redefining the standards of universal turning machining. It provides unparalleled adaptability to individual user needs, ensuring versatility, precision, and efficiency regardless of the material or project complexity.

parameters.name: Max. internal diameter of the collet

main_characteristics.title: Advanced component machining with a sub-spindle and Y-axis
content: Dynamic spindle drive and high-power integrated motor spindle for maximum machining efficiency. Additionally, rear-side machining capability with the ISM 36 synchronous spindle. The Y-axis allows for ± 40 mm movement for precise milling operations and comprehensive side surface processing.

main_characteristics.title: Increased productivity with an automatic bar feeder
content: Standard bar passage diameter of 51 mm (optional up to 65 mm). Available gripper for handling elements measuring 65 mm x 200 mm and weighing 3 kg on request. Optional robot interface compliant with the DMG MORI standard, compatible with most bar feeders.

main_characteristics.title: Higher efficiency in machining with a bar feeder
content: Standard bar passage diameter of 51 mm (optional up to 65 mm). Available gripper for handling elements measuring 65 mm x 200 mm and weighing 3 kg on request. Optional robot interface compliant with the DMG MORI standard, allowing compatibility with most bar feeders.

main_characteristics.title: Robust construction with a spacious work area, ideal for machining custom parts.
content: Machining of elements with a maximum diameter of 320 mm, with the ability to shift along the Z-axis up to 540 mm. Compact design ensuring a minimal footprint of 5.0 m².

main_characteristics.title: 3D control systems with an exceptional 19-inch SLIMline SIEMENS touchscreen panel or a 19-inch FANUC touchscreen panel
content: SIEMENS 19-inch control panel with a color multi-touch screen in DMG MORI SLIMline, providing intuitive programming and easy operation.
FANUC 19-inch control panel with a color touchscreen in DMG MORI SLIMline, enabling 3D simulation and easy contour verification.
DMG MORI SMARTkey: Customization with additional 8 GB memory, providing user-tailored functions.

specification.name: Optional Part Catcher
param: For elements measuring: ø65 x 200 mm, weight: 3 kg

specification.name: Optional Robot Interface
param: Compliant with DMG MORI standard, compatible with most bar feeders

specification.name: Construction
param: Compact with a large work area for machining custom parts

specification.name: 3D Control
param: DMG MORI SLIMline 19-inch color multi-touch SIEMENS control panel for intuitive programming and easy operation
